identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a research platform that feels like a 'Digital Library of Alexandria' meets 'Bloomberg Terminal'. Precision, Clarity, and Authority.
principles: Emotion: Trust & Insight (Stark contrast, no muddy grays)
Content is King: The Document is the Hero
Negative Space: Data needs room to breathe

heading.usage: Main headings (H1-H3), Feature titles. Use for 'Editorial' feel.

body.usage: UI elements, body text, navigation, buttons. Geometric but human.

mono.usage: Data tables, code snippets, metadata tags, document IDs.

rules: Overlines (e.g., 'ANALYSIS COMPLETE') must be Uppercase + tracking-widest + text-xs.
Body text line-height must be relaxed (1.6) for readability of long documents.

primary.name: Electric Indigo
primary.usage: Primary Actions, Active States, Key Highlights

secondary.name: Obsidian
secondary.usage: Headings, Strong Borders, Sidebar Background (Dark Mode)

buttons.style: Sharp corners or slightly rounded (rounded-md). No pill shapes for this 'Pro' tool.
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-primary border border-input hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground

cards.style: Flat, 1px border (border-border), no shadow by default. Hover: border-primary/50 transition-colors.
cards.glass: bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/20 (for sticky headers)

inputs.style: h-10 rounded-md border border-input bg-transparent px-3 py-1 text-sm shadow-sm transition-colors focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-ring

navigation.sidebar: Fixed left, w-64, border-r border-border, bg-surface-light/50 backdrop-blur-xl
navigation.topbar: Sticky top, h-16, border-b border-border, bg-background/80 backdrop-blur-md

textures: Subtle noise overlay (opacity 0.02) on backgrounds to reduce digital flatness.

motion.micro: Active elements should scale slightly (scale-[1.02]) on hover.

landing_hero.usage: Hero Section Background or Side Visual

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add '@fontsource/playfair-display', '@fontsource/manrope', and '@fontsource/jetbrains-mono' to package.json.
2. TAILWIND CONFIG: Update 'fontFamily' to use these fonts. Set 'sans' to Manrope, 'serif' to Playfair Display, 'mono' to JetBrains Mono.
3. SHADCN: When adding components, ensure 'rounded-md' is used for radius, not 'rounded-xl'. We want a professional, crisp look.
4. LAYOUT: Use the 'Bento Grid' strategy for the Dashboard Overview. Don't just stack cards vertically.
5. DATA-TESTID: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards).
6. NO GRADIENT TEXT: Do not use gradient text for headings. Keep it solid Obsidian (#09090B) for authority.
7. USE LENIS: Implement 'lenis' for smooth scrolling on the landing page.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
